title: I asked to change the email account and you change the password?
body:
I am writing with an account I made 2 minutes ago, since I can't log into my real lol account.

So here is the situation.
The email account associated with my LOL account was deleted for person reasons.
To change the associated email account in this case, i had to use the 'support' system and do some recovery questions.(I don't know why i have to do 'recovery' process, but this was advised by an operator through support system)
I also explained why I am changing the email account on the recovery survey, too.

The above was like 2 hours ago, and 5 minutes ago when I tried to log into the game, it says "invalid username/password combination. Please try again".
So I click on "Forgot your password?", and the client says it sent 'how-to-recover-password' to my email, which was the one deleted.(and of course I checked the email account I request to be changed to)

the in game ID is KRRI.
please fix this stupid situation and stop asking me to rewrite this through support ticket again and again?

replies.body: It won't be possible to recover an account without access to the registered email, and you'll want a specialist from support to help out.  You'll want to use the [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and reach out to our account recovery team, who will help with your specific issue individually.  They can help with updating your information and email as well.  Good luck!
